plot: This second "sequel" to Edward D. Wood's "Plan Nine from Outer Space" is set in 19th-century Wyoming, where Stanely the Kid tracks down space vampire Black Bela, who has removed the brain from the head of The Marshall.
title: Plan 11: Black Bela Returns
plot_es: This second "sequel" to Edward D. Wood's "Plan Nine from Outer Space" is set in 19th-century Wyoming, where Stanely the Kid tracks down space vampire Black Bela, who has removed the brain from the head of The Marshall.
plot_en: This second "sequel" to Edward D. Wood's "Plan Nine from Outer Space" is set in 19th-century Wyoming, where Stanely the Kid tracks down space vampire Black Bela, who has removed the brain from the head of The Marshall.
